content.rendered: ACPs provide project teams the flexibility to use locally-relevant, equivalent means of demonstrating compliance to credit requirements. Read up on ACPs applicable in Canada:

excerpt.rendered: ACPs provide project teams the flexibility to use locally-relevant, equivalent means of demonstrating…
